strapiEvent.name: 124th Tontitown Grape Festival
strapiEvent.description:
The 124th Tontitown Grape Festival kicks off tomorrow night for a week of community fun, carnival rides, and great food lasting Aug 1-5.

  • Something for everybody: The festival schedule includes free nightly entertainment, traditional grape stomping, carnival rides, a craft fair, and the infamously delicious Italian Spaghetti Dinners and grape ice cream.
  • Move Your Feet: If all that grape stomping makes you want to move your feet, sign up for the Run for the Grapes 5K on Saturday morning. The Festival ends Saturday night with the Grand Prize Giveaway of a 2023 Honda Pioneer 1000, to be presented by this yearâ€™s Queen Concordia.

See the full festival schedule HERE.
